Content:
See synchronized Spotify lyrics inside VS Code while coding.

--- ## ‚ú® Features - üìå **Live lyrics sync** with your Spotify playback. - üé® Lyrics colors auto-themed from album cover (via `colorthief`). - üñ•Ô∏è Smooth **side panel view** ‚Äì code on the left, lyrics on the right. - üì± **Mobile mode** ‚Äì black unplayed lines, white played lines (like Spotify mobile app). - üîë Simple **one-time login** using your own Spotify Client ID. - üö™ Quick logout command to reset session. - ‚ö° Set a **maximum tracks cache size** for lyrics syncing. --- ## üì∏ Demo ## ## ‚ö°Ô∏è Installation 1. Open **VS Code** ‚Üí Extensions ‚Üí search `spotilyrics` or [install from VS Code Marketplace](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=therepanic.spotilyrics). 2. Run the command:

Content:
---

## üîë Authentication (one-time setup)

1. Go to [Spotify Developer Dashboard](https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard).
2. Create an app ‚Üí copy **Client ID**.
3. **Important:** set the **Redirect URI** for your app to: `http://127.0.0.1:8000/callback`
4. Run the `Show Spotify Lyrics via Spotilyrics` command.
5. Paste your **Client ID** in the panel and log in.
6. Enjoy synced lyrics while coding! üé∂

> ‚ÑπÔ∏è Why? ‚Äì To respect Spotify API rate limits, you need your own ID.

---

## ‚å®Ô∏è Commands

- `Show Spotify Lyrics via Spotilyrics` (`spotilyrics.lyrics`) ‚Äì open synced lyrics panel.
- `Toggle Mobile Mode` (`spotilyrics.toggleMobileMode`) ‚Äì switch between normal and mobile mode.
- `Logout from Spotilyrics` (`spotilyrics.logout`) ‚Äì clear session and re-auth when needed.
- `Set Tracks Cache Max Size` (`spotilyrics.setTracksCacheMaxSize`) ‚Äì configure the maximum number of tracks cached for lyrics.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Tech stack

- [Spotify Web API](https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/web-api/)
- [LRClib](https://lrclib.net/) for lyrics with timing
- [colorthief](https://lokeshdhakar.com/projects/color-thief/) for cover-based theme
- TypeScript + VS Code WebView

---

## üìú License

This project is licensed as **Unlicensed**.  
Feel free to use, hack, and remix it ‚Äì but no warranties üòâ

---

4. Ejecuta el comando `Show Spotify Lyrics via Spotilyrics`.
5. Pega tu **Client ID** en el panel e inicia sesi√≥n.
6. ¬°Disfruta de las letras sincronizadas mientras codificas! üé∂

> ‚ÑπÔ∏è ¬øPor qu√©? ‚Äì Para respetar los l√≠mites de tasa de la API de Spotify, necesitas tu propio ID.
